Interface Model

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConcreteModel, ConcreteModelProxy
public interface Model
Defines interface for core Model class

    • setProfile

      void setProfile(UserProfile profile)
      Sets the user profile.
      Parameters:
      profile - the user profile to set

    • getProfile

      UserProfile getProfile(String email)
      Gets the user profile associated with the given email.
      Parameters:
      email - the email of the user
      Returns:
      the user's profile

    • updateProfile

      void updateProfile(UserProfile profile)
      Updates the user profile in the system.
      Parameters:
      profile - the updated user profile

    • deleteProfile

      void deleteProfile(String email)
      Deletes the user profile associated with the given email.
      Parameters:
      email - the email of the user

      Adds a meal for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      meal - the meal to add
      email - the user's email

    • getMeals

      list of meals

      Gets alternative food options for a selected item in a meal.
      Parameters:
      originalMeal - the original meal
      selectedFoodItem - the food item to be replaced
      goals - user's dietary goals
      Returns:
      list of alternative food items

      Returns:
      list of meals on that date

      end - end date
      Returns:
      list of meals within the time frame
